name: Rocket Shooter Survival
description:
Can you beat the world's hardest space survival game and enter the hall of fame?

In this game, you control a spaceship that is being gunned down by enemies; tap the screen to dodge the rockets. Survive long enough, and you move on to the next level.

As you complete levels, you can unlock more spaceship designs to play with.

Complete all the levels and you may apply for the hall of fame!

This game comes with a stats screen to compare stats - including total deaths and deaths per level - with your friends.
